page.title: 16TV and Radio Masts, N.Jersey
page.content:
Due to the fact that our block contains the highest ground in the Island, two{relay transmitters}for {radio and television signals}from the mainland are to be found.
At Fremont point is situated the Independent Broadcasting Authority's relay station. This receives {television signals}transmitted by the BBC and IBA from Devon and the Isle of Wight via Alderney and re-broadcasts them around the islands.
The Les Platons relay transmitter receives and re-broadcasts high quality{stereo VHF/FM radio signals originating from the BBC to premises in Jersey.
